per_frame_1=dav0 = bass*time;
per_frame_2=dav1 = 100000*200;
per_frame_3=dav2 = dav1*0.9;
per_frame_4=dav3 = dav1*1.1;
per_frame_5=wave_r = wave_r +1*( 0.60*sin(dav1*dav0) + 0.40*sin(dav1*dav0) );
per_frame_6=wave_g = wave_g + 1*( 0.60*sin(dav2*dav0) + 0.40*sin(dav2*dav0) );
per_frame_7=wave_b = wave_b + 1*( 0.60*sin(dav3*dav0) + 0.40*sin(dav3*dav0) );
per_frame_8=wave_mystery = 0.5*sin(0.35*bass);
per_frame_9=decay = decay - 0.01*equal(frame%10,0);
per_frame_10=q2=bass+treb+mid;
per_pixel_1=zoom = zoom + (0.1*(1+rad+0.5*bass));
per_pixel_2=mymovement = sin(sin(1.211*time)+ 0.3*cos(0.887*time)- 0.4*sin(1.453*time));
per_pixel_3=rot = rot - 0.15*sin(mymovement-ang);
warp_1=`sampler sampler_worms;
warp_2=`float3 color, mus;
warp_3=`float dx,dy;
warp_4=`shader_body {
warp_5=`float2 uv1 = (uv-.5) * aspect.xy;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`
warp_8=`float2 uv6 = uv1;
warp_9=`float z = q29*2*length(uv1)+rand_frame * 64;
warp_10=`float2 d = normalize(uv1);
warp_11=`float2 rs = clamp(tan(z)*d,-8,8);
warp_12=`uv += .004*GetBlur1(uv)*float2 (0,1);//rs/20;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`
warp_15=`uv6 = .4*sin(uv1*18*rand_frame);
warp_16=`mus = .051/(length(uv6));
warp_17=`mus *= float3 (treb*.5,bass*.5,mid*.5);
warp_18=`
warp_19=`float3 blur = GetBlur2(frac(uv));
warp_20=`
warp_21=`float3 crisp= tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
warp_22=`
warp_23=`float3 ret1 = crisp - blur*.03 + .15*mus;
warp_24=`float2 uv2 = (uv_orig-.5)-float3(bass*.1,treb*.1+0.1*q25,mid*.1);
warp_25=`
warp_26=`q25 = 1;
warp_27=`ret = q25*(ret1*.99-.02) + (1-q25)* GetPixel(uv_orig);
warp_28=`
warp_29=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`//Code bits by Flexi and Geiss
comp_5=`
comp_6=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*8;
comp_7=`    float1 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) ).y;
comp_8=`    float1 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) ).y;
comp_9=`    float2 uv_y = uv+float2(dx,dy)*0.55;  
comp_10=`    float2 uv_y2 = (uv_y*1.25)-.125;  
comp_11=`
comp_12=`  
comp_13=`    ret = lerp(ret,1-ret,.7*GetBlur1(uv_y)+.2*GetPixel(uv));
comp_14=`    ret = lerp(ret,ret-.1*GetBlur3(uv_y)+.1*GetBlur1(uv_y2)+.42*GetPixel(uv_y),.25);
comp_15=`    //ret *= .75;
comp_16=`    ret *= saturate(length(ret-0.5)*5);
comp_17=`    //ret = ret.xy;
comp_18=`    ret = lum(ret);
comp_19=`    ret += 1.25;
comp_20=`    ret *= ret*.45;
comp_21=`    float3 mask = GetBlur3(uv)-GetBlur1(uv)-.25*GetBlur2(uv_y);
comp_22=`    ret *= lerp(ret,1.3*ret*mask,pow(hue_shader.zxy,q2*(1-ret)));
comp_23=`    ret += .05;
comp_24=`    ret *= 1.1*ret;
comp_25=`    ret *= (hue_shader*4)-2.75;
comp_26=`    ret *= 3.5-.5*saturate(ret);
comp_27=`
comp_28=`}
